W18_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W18_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_TITLE.text: Capitol City: Seat of the Union

W18_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You found a metropolis that seems familiar on the other side of the door. Could there really be spirits in a world like this?

W18_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: You acquired a spirit's power. Time to head to your next destination.

W18_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_040_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_040_DETAIL.text: You acquired power from all the spirits. Best get back to Miyako City.
